items.title: Why Do We Exist?
items.description: NFTs are a perfect way to deliver your content to consumers.  The NFT is minted on the blockchain and the video content is stored on ARWEAVE and IPFS, two decentralized encrypted information storage networks. Simply access to the content by opening the NFT in your crypto wallet.

items.title:
Empowering the creators
by eliminating the middle man.
items.description: Other platforms want 20% to 40% of the money you earn from your viewers. The fee to use the GotGirl platform is just 5% of each transaction, which covers the costs of publishing your content to the blockchain and storing it permanently on a decentralized network.  Get paid much more, way faster, using cryptocurrency and web3 technology.

section_title.title: Private shows from your favorite cam-girls published as NFTs you keep in your wallet!

texts.content: Your requested cam-girl content delivered to your crypto wallet.  Access it whenever you want, forever.
